evidence_item.section: IX. Legal / Regulatory Context > Act 776 of 2025
evidence_item.claim_summary: Act 776 of 2025 appropriates $300,000 from the Specialty Court Program Fund to the AOC for Specialty Court Program costs and Advisory Committee support.

evidence_item.section: IX. Legal / Regulatory Context > Act 890 of 2025
evidence_item.claim_summary: Act 890 of 2025 appropriates $5,000,000 for DHS DAABHS Crisis Services.

evidence_item.section: IX. Legal / Regulatory Context > Implementing Policy
evidence_item.claim_summary: Arkansas Supreme Court Administrative Orders 14 and 18 require specialty court programs to be approved through administrative plans.

source.title: In re Admin. Order Nos. 14 & 18, 2012 Ark. 468
